org.openmrs.module.reporting.dataset.def.name: HI-FingerprintStatistics
org.openmrs.module.reporting.dataset.def.description: Number of patients with Biometric Data Capture
org.openmrs.module.reporting.dataset.def.sqlQuery: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT biomet.patient_Id) as NumberOfPatients, DATE(biomet.date_created) as CaptureDate FROM biometricinfo biomet JOIN patient patbio on (biomet.patient_Id=patbio.patient_id) WHERE patbio.voided=0 GROUP BY DATE(date_created)
